title: Can you have two accounts on the same email?
body: My little brother accidentally forgot which Email was linked to so I was looking at making him a new one since he hasn't really put any money into it yet. I was going to link it to the same email my account goes through. Is this possible?

replies.body:
Yes, you can have multiple accounts with the same email address tied to them, you just cannot *create* them with the same email. You'll have to use another **valid** email address before you can change it to the primary email you want to share across your accounts. If your little brother needs help changing the email on his account, he can simply reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be happy to help.

If you have any questions, let me know.
You can change it to your Email, but you'd need to know the Email the account is currently linked to in order to do so.
